definition: horizontal/across/crosswise/horizontal stroke (in Chinese characters)/to place (sth) flat (on a surface)/to cross (a river, etc)/in a jumble/chaotic/(in fixed expressions) harsh and unreasonable/violent
to shake/to flap/to vibrate/to resonate/to rise up with spirit/to rouse oneself
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: We study the decay rate of solutions of beam equations with damping and external force.
sentences.chinese: 研究含外力和阻尼項一類梁的橫振動方程解的率減率。
